backend/main.mo: Backend canister managing user profiles, access control, approvals, and admin actions like activation and deactivation.
feature_evidence.json: List of implemented features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence data for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Existing summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting metadata, PWA manifest, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and installation settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Simple service worker providing asset caching, fetch fallback, and automatic cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authentication guards, layout handling, and protected routes for dashboard, memory, question papers, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component with navigation, user menu, and logout handling using Internet Identity and admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated/anonymous backend actor, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, roles, admin checks, and approval-related actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme colors and global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard UI with links to memory and question paper sections and an overview of the platform.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity, redirecting authenticated users and showing a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/pages/memory/MemoryPage.tsx: A placeholder memory-management page showing upcoming upload, folder, and search features and an empty state for future file storage.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingUsernamePag: A username onboarding form that validates input, saves a new user profile, handles errors, and redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/question-papers/Quest: A landing page for question‑paper features with cards for image uploads and external links, all currently disabled pending backend work.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines project state for the AIT MIZO archive app, including architecture notes, required images, and a list of existing implemented features. Captures versioning, centralized-access model, and core functional requirements.
